```{r}
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
url <- "https://web.archive.org/web/20181024132313/http://www.stevetheump.com/Payrolls.htm"
h <- read_html(url)
nodes <- html_nodes(h, "table")
#sapply(nodes[1:4], html_table)
sapply(nodes[19:21], html_table)
html_table(nodes[[19]])
html_table(nodes[[20]])
html_table(nodes[[21]])


```

```{r}
tab1 <- html_table(nodes[[10]]) %>% setNames(c("no","team","payroll","average")) %>% select(team,payroll,average)
tab1 <- tab1[-1,]
tab2 <- html_table(nodes[[19]]) %>% setNames(c("team","payroll","average")) %>% select(team,payroll,average)
tab2 <- tab2[-1,]
full_join(tab1,tab2,by="team")
```
